Current Members
The current members of the City Council are:



* [Ward Roddam](mailto:ward.roddam@rockdaletx.gov)
  , Mayor - At-Large (5/2028)
* [Daniel Willie](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/402/Daniel-Willie-Council-Member)
  , Council Member - West (5/2028)
* [Lin Perry](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/219/Lin-Perry-Council-Member "Doug Calame")
  , Mayor Pro-Tem, Council Member - West  (5/2026)

* [Esme Ruelas-Olivares](https://www.rockdalecityhall.com/378/Esme-Ruelas-Olivares-Council-Member)
  , Council Member - East (5/28)
* [Dave Melton](https://www.rockdalecityhall.com/383/Dave-Melton-Council-Member)
  , Council Member - East (5/2026)
* [Brad Caffey](https://www.rockdalecityhall.com/377/Brad-Caffey-Council-Member)
  , Council Member - West (5/2027)
* [Scott Starnes](https://www.rockdalecityhall.com/371/Scott-Starnes-Council-Member)
  , Council Member - East (5/2027)



Election and Appointment
The
[City Charter (PDF)](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/DocumentView.aspx?DID=26 "City Charter")
provides for a City Council consisting of a mayor and six members. The mayor is elected at large, while three council members are elected each from the east and west wards. The City Council elects a mayor pro-tem to perform the duties of the mayor in the absence or disability of the mayor. The council also appoints members of the various city
[boards, committees and commissions](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/97/Boards-Committees-Commissions "boards, committees and commissions")
.

Requirements
The mayor and council members serve three-year terms and must be:

* 21 years old
* Living in the district they represent
* Residents of the city for at least 12 months prior to the election
